message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe would greatly benefit your needs. Given its exceptional value and quality, we're offering it to you at an exclusive price of $9,500. This is a special opportunity tailored specifically for you, considering the significant worth this product holds for you at $8,000. We're confident it will meet your expectations and deliver the results you're looking for. Please let us know if you have any questions or if you'd like to proceed with this offer.
